entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 1:29 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:29 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
